item.title: Creation Myth
item.description: In the dawn of time, the Gods came from the North and brought land, water, plants, animals, and all life as we know it from their divine hands.

item.title: Hook Words
item.description: Sea of souls God of the hunt Great devourer Accept this offering of drained husks Overcome the great barrier

item.title: Magical Saturation
item.description: Each world has a magical “magnetism” which determines the amount of magic saturation it has, as well as how easy it is to travel to and from it.

item.title: The Sea of Souls
item.description: Upon dying, every mortal soul travels to the sea of souls, where the tide takes them to the central isle in the sea of souls, where the dead are ferried into the afterlife.
